en.title: The Challenges You Face
en.subtitle: We understand the unique struggles of navigating a foreign education system

items.title: Language Barriers
items.description: Struggling to communicate with teachers, understand report cards, or help with homework in English.

items.title: System Confusion
items.description: The American K-12 system is vastly different from what you knew. GPA? AP classes? College apps? It's overwhelming.

items.title: Time Constraints
items.description: Working long hours leaves little time to research schools, programs, and educational opportunities.

items.title: Cultural Gap
items.description: Different expectations, parenting styles, and educational values can create friction at home and school.

zh.title: 您面临的挑战
zh.subtitle: 我们理解在陌生教育系统中摸索的独特困难

items.title: 语言障碍
items.description: 难以用英语与老师沟通、理解成绩单或辅导孩子作业。

items.title: 系统困惑
items.description: 美国K-12系统与您熟悉的完全不同。GPA是什么？AP课程？大学申请？让人不知所措。

items.title: 时间紧张
items.description: 长时间工作让您很难有时间研究学校、课程和教育机会。

items.title: 文化差异
items.description: 不同的期望、育儿方式和教育理念可能在家庭和学校产生摩擦。
